entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Trail
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:23 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to snow at times heavy this evening. Amount 15 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
